description:
Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Get the most with the ALO mobile app — your quick & easy pass for early drop access, app-exclusive drops & promotions and more. It’s easier than ever to shop for studio-to-street looks and take your practice with you.

PrettyLittleThing is the generation-defining style source for every kind of It Girl.
Founded with the belief that elevated fashion essentials should be available to all, we deliver a wide edit of womens clothing, accessories, and jewellery. 

From the classic and timeless to contemporary and cutting edge womens fashion, our pieces are designed with the individual in mind. With everyday wardrobe essentials to dresses, co-ords and more, online shopping is effortless with the PLT app.

- Wish list - Save now, shop later. All your favourite items in one place. 
- Exclusive offers – As an app member you’ll be the first to know about exclusive offers.
- Fast and secure checkout – This one goes without saying. 
- Track your order – Global delivery tracked straight from checkout to your door.  
- PLT Royalty – Your next look? Already out for delivery thanks to unlimited next day delivery. Not to mention, free returns are valid for all Royalty members. 
- Pay easily, safely, and securely with Apple Pay.

Our icon? The unicorn. Because we cater to the individual. No two people — or wardrobes — should ever be the same. 

Shop today and express yourself in PrettyLittleThing.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more

Wide selections

Considerate services

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

About the App:
Flipkart brings you the thrill of discovery with a treasure trove of products—mobiles, fashion, electronics, home appliances, groceries, and more. It's your one-stop shop with amazing discounts, SuperCoins on every purchase, fun rewards, and timely deal alerts. A new addition is Flipkart Minutes, where you get everything you need delivered in just 10 minutes! All wrapped in one app built for your ultimate convenience. Explore it all in your language.
Flipkart Minutes: Forgot to grab the groceries? Need a last-minute gift? Prepping for a party? Or just realized you’re out of your favorite snacks? Flipkart Minutes delivers everything you need & want in just 10 minutes! From the freshest fruits & veggies to the latest gadgets daily essentials & more—we've got it all at UNBEATABLE prices.
Spoyl: The ultimate Gen-Z fashion hub. Expect fresh drops, LIT trends, and genderless styles that let you be unapologetically you. Spoyl yourself and be the trendsetter in your squad!
Grocery: Skip the queue, save on fuel, and get groceries delivered to your doorstep. Just remember, it’s better to order a day in advance—not when you’re mid-chutney and missing a chilli! Living life by the minute isn’t scalable.
Personal loans: Get flexible EMIs, affordable rates, and a seamless experience that makes loan approvals easier and faster than ever.
Vibes: Turn online shopping into an experience that feels as real as being in the store, all from the comfort of your couch.
Easy on the eyes, easier to navigate—our new design puts everything you need right where you want it.
Group Buy: Shop together, save together. Because sharing is caring!
Brand Mall: Love the mall but prefer your living room? Explore our premium brands collection without leaving your couch.
Tailor-made recommendations and trending stores, designed to get even better when you’re logged in. Give it a try and let us know how we did!
A regional language experience that feels like home, no matter where you are.
Faster than ever before—our engineers have outdone themselves this time.
Update the app and discover how we’ve crafted something for everyone, with you at the heart of it all.
 
_________________________________
 
*Note on Personal Loans*
 
Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd (SuperMoney) is a Flipkart Group financial technology company. Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd only provides a platform to facilitate money lending by Regulated Entities viz. registered Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs) or Banks to users and is acting as an Loan Service Provider in partnership with Axis Bank & IDFC Bank. 
Loan tenures offered by the lenders vary from 6 months up to 72 months. The rates start from 10.5% and may go up to 33%. Loan amount ranges from Rs 5000 up to Rs 10L. Interest rates and loan amounts are determined by the lenders basis customer profile and not Scapic or Flipkart. 
Sample working is shown below
 
Representative Example:
Loan Amount
Rs 102008
Processing Fee (Including 18% GST)
Rs 2407
Stamp Duty
Rs 20
Net Disbursal Amount
Rs 99581
Interest Rate
20.50%
Monthly EMI
Rs 6631
Loan Period
18 months
First Emi date
10/12/2023*
Last Emi date
10/05/2025*
*Subject to change based on disbursal date
 
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) :  33%
Interest rates available on the platform are provided by the lending partner (NBFC or Bank) that is approving the loan. The rates vary depending on the customer profile based on credit score and other factors, as per lenders.
 
Privacy Policy
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-privacy-policy
Scapic T&C
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-tnc
 
Partner Links:
https://www.idfcfirstbank.com/personal-banking/adlp/digital-lending-partners/scapic-innovations
https://www.axisbank.com/retail/loans/personal-loan/personal-loan-lsp
_____________________________________
If you have more ideas on how we can solve for India or find a bug you’d like to bring to our attention, drop a note to app-feedback@flipkart.com.

The Made-in-China.com App is a world leading wholesale mobile B2B marketplace for global trade. Buy products from quality Chinese suppliers all from your mobile device conveniently. 

3 STEPS to complete your transaction:
Search Products > Place Orders > Trade Safely

Shop What You Need
We provide safe and reliable online trading services. All transaction processes can be completed in our app. You can place an order and track your order anytime, anywhere.

Easy Sourcing
Source millions of new and innovative products from Verified Suppliers. 40,000,000 products from 27 categories are all for your purchase requirements. Now you can easily select and compare products.

Get Multiple Quotations
Post customized sourcing requests, you will receive price quotes in 24 hours. 
6,000,000 suppliers gathered here are trade agents, wholesalers, retailers, manufacturers and SMEs, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada and so on.

Keep in Touch
Send inquiries to get latest factory discounts or sample requests. Chat directly with suppliers by TradeMessenger system. You can make a voice call or video call to verify the supplier.  

Brand New Smart Expo
Hold various online exhibitions that simultaneous with major trade fairs from all over the world. No matter where you are, you can efficiently browse the virtual booths and start face-to-face online meetings with exhibitors at once.

Member Events
Organize diverse forms of member events on a regular basis. Semi-monthly live video streaming, celebration activities during festivals, events that open to everyone...... All is waiting for you!

Languages & Currencies Supported
The Made-in-China.com supports 16 popular languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, German, Dutch, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian. And 18 local currencies are now available.

Moreover
Get most relevant recommendations based on your sourcing preferences.
Share products and suppliers on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.
“Featured” channel helps you find trustworthy suppliers and high-quality products.

The Made-in-China.com App, a must-have app in global B2B trade!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!

In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:

Store mode

Use your QR on the Zara App for:

Step into effortless style with the Forever 21 app — your go-to destination for trendsetting looks and exclusive perks.

Swipe, select & shop! It’s a fashion store on the go with the Myntra Mobile App. Shop for clothing, footwear, accessories and home furnishing for men, women and kids. Get all your favourite fashion brands and collections at the click of a button.


Guaranteed 100% original products, hassle-free returns or exchanges, secure payments, EMI options. Also get great sign-up benefits and free shipping on your first order.

Browse through 5 Lakh + products from 2500 brands instantly on the Myntra shopping app. Explore the latest trends in lifestyle and shop from the biggest clothing store for Kurtis, Sarees, Shoes, T-shirts, Jackets, Jeans, Bags, Skirts, Dresses, Jewellery, Watches, Wallets, Footwear, Home Furnishing and much more.

The online collection of products includes

•Men's shopping -  Watches, suits, shoes, T-shirts, shirts, trousers, gym wear, backpacks, wallets, sunglasses, casual shoes, sneakers, smartwatches, headphones, sports shoes from brands like Puma, Adidas, Nike, Reebok, Casio, Levis, Pepe, Fastrack, Hugo Boss, Raymonds, Wills Lifestyle, John Players, WROGN, HRX, Roadster, Flying Machine, Fossil, Red Tape & more

Shop from top brands like Forever 21, All About You, MANGO, Only, AND, W, Biba, Next, Vero Moda, Roadster, Esprit, Dressberry, Libas, AKS, Catwalk, Inc 5, Lavie, Hidesign, Michael Kors, Daniel Klein & more

Shop from top brands like Gini & Jony, United Colors of Benetton, U.S. Polo Assn. Kids, Mothercare, Mini Club, adidas, Allen Solly Junior, Lilliput, Next, Puma, The Children’s Place


• Home Furnishing - Bedsheets, cushion covers, blankets, towels, curtains, pillow covers, bath rugs & home décor. Shop from brands like Swayam, Spaces, Raymonds, & Portico New York.

APP FEATURES

•Find products you love: Choose from a vast collection of over 5 Lakhs styles for men, women, teens & kids on our online clothing store

•Refine your search based on popularity, discount, prices, colours, sizes & more using sort & filter features

•Avail massive discounts: Get products at their best prices with integrated Myntra coupon codes in your account.  Get notifications on best deals & offers

•Fast & secure checkout: Pay by cash-on-delivery, net banking or choose credit/ debit card options

•View detailed product information with rich images & style notes from our fashion editors

•Log-in seamlessly using Facebook & Google

•Promise of timely delivery backed by an extensive delivery network

•Wishlist collections: Save styles for later by adding to your wishlist straight from the app

•Sharing made easy: Get style suggestions from your friends by sharing on WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, & email

•Refer your friends & get huge benefits

•Keep Active with Myntra Move: Get rewarded for tracking your steps on Myntra Move. The steps are tracked using your phone's Apple Health app.

SHOP M&S WITH EASE

Make shopping for your favourite M&S products easier than ever, whether you're at home, on the go, or in store, with the M&S app.

From fresh groceries and gift ideas to the latest fashion, home, and beauty finds, shop across all your essentials and make every purchase more rewarding with your digital Sparks loyalty card.

With Sparks you’ll unlock exclusive offers, birthday treats, Scan & Shop, and much more.

Browse thousands of food products, check prices, discover the latest Dine In menus, check availability, and be the first to find out what’s new.


SHOP ACROSS YOUR FAVOURITE CATEGORIES

From fashion to food, shop with ease across our bestselling categories:

- Womenswear, lingerie, menswear, & kidswear
- School uniform
- Beauty & skincare
- Homeware & furniture
- Flowers, hampers, food & wine
- Seasonal offers & sales


GET MORE FROM M&S WITH SPARKS

- Personalised Sparks offers tailored to you
- Free birthday treat
- Charity donations every time you shop
- Perks for new parents with The Parent hood club
- Get e-receipts emailed after shopping in store


BROWSE M&S FOOD IN-STORE PRODUCTS

- Check stock & price in your local Foodhall
- See what’s new every week
- Plan your shop with our digital shopping list


WHY CHOOSE M&S?

- Effortless online shopping
- Free delivery over £60 / €50 (fashion, homeware, or beauty)
- Free nominated-day flower delivery*
- Free to Click & Collect in your chosen store
- Order tracking on all purchases
- Easy paperless returns
- Digital receipts when shopping in store*
- Exclusive Sparks loyalty rewards and personalised offers
- Skip the tills with Scan & Shop*


SCAN & SHOP

Want to check out faster? Skip the queues with Scan & Shop in our M&S Food stores —  scan and pay for your groceries directly in the app (up to £45). Use free in-store Wi-Fi or mobile data.


ENHANCED IN-STORE EXPERIENCE

Shopping in store and want something in a different size, colour, or style? Scan the barcode and order for delivery to your home or nearest M&S.


GET INSPIRED

Browse our features and articles to get the latest advice, trends and tips on fashion, food, beauty, and entertaining.


M&S RECIPES

Discover hundreds of exclusive recipes made with the best M&S ingredients. Save your favourites to your personal cookbook and create your shopping list in one click.


FIND US

Looking for your nearest M&S store? Use the store finder to get directions and quickly locate your nearest M&S.


DOWNLOAD NOW

Download the free M&S app and enjoy smarter shopping today.


FOLLOW US

Follow M&S on social media and stay updated with the latest news, offers and sale updates:

Facebook: @marksandspencer
Instagram: @marksandspencer @marksandspencerfood @marksandspencerstyle
X: @marksandspencer
Pinterest: @marksandspencer
TikTok: @mandsfood


Visit: www.marksandspencer.com

developer: Pick n Pay Retailers PTY LTD
description:
Welcome to the easiest way to shop with Pick n Pay.
 
Experience shopping like never before with our best app yet. Shop over 30 000 products across a wide range of categories including groceries, homeware, electronics, and more.
 
Enjoy exclusive deals, in-store pricing, Smart Shopper rewards, and fast delivery right to your doorstep. Whether you need groceries, homeware, or more, Pick n Pay asap! & Smart Shopper makes shopping easier than ever. Shop from the comfort of your home with super-fast delivery in just 60 minutes, smart AI search, and precise order tracking.
 
YOUR ONE-STOP GROCERY SHOP
 
From fresh fruit and veggies, dairy, frozen food, pantry staples, and home appliances, to pet care, electronics, health products, and even load shedding essentials, you’ll find over 30,000 products from all your favourite brands. Plus, enjoy alcohol delivery including liquor and wine.
 
ALL YOUR FAVOURITE BRANDS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
 
Browse top brands like Nestlé, Coca-Cola, Pampers, and Simba. Whether it’s baby products, coffee, cheese, wine, or ready-made meals, you’ll find everything you need in one place. If it’s in-store, it’s on the app.
 
FRESH & FAST DELIVERY WITHOUT LEAVING HOME
 
Enjoy fresh, fast deliveries to over 400 destinations across South Africa, with orders sent from your nearest store. Our goal is to get your order to your door as quickly as possible, delivered in as little as 60 minutes for just R35 per order. With smart search tools, easy cart additions, and location services, you can shop, pay, and track your order with ease.
 
EARN AND SPEND YOUR SMART SHOPPER POINTS
 
Link your Smart Shopper card to the app and earn points on every order. You can now spend your Smart Shopper points on the app too.
 
BONUS POINTS AT OUR FEATURED PARTNERS
 
Earn Smart Shopper points when shopping at our featured partners like TymeBank, Netflorist, BP, and Europcar, as well as through programs like Momentum Multiply, Absa Rewards, and Standard Bank UCount Rewards.
 
EARN EBUCKS
 
Get up to 30% back in eBucks on every order.
 
EASY PAYMENT AND ORDERING
 
With quick and simple payment options, finishing your order is a breeze. Your shopper will carefully select your items, and a driver will deliver your order straight to your door. Get live updates on your order status through notifications.
 
MORE REWARDS WITH PICK N PAY CLUBS
 
Join our Pick n Pay Clubs and enjoy exclusive deals and competitions. From the Pick n Pay Wine Club to the Baby Club and Coffee Club, get additional savings, member-only offers, and even triple points on select products.
 
TOP-UP, DIGITAL RECEIPTS & MORE
 
Quickly top up airtime and data with prepaid options, and enjoy digital receipts sent straight to your inbox for easier tracking. No more paper clutter!
 
THE SMARTER WAY TO SHOP
 
The app offers a simpler, smarter way to shop. Get instant savings, personalised discounts, and rewards for every purchase. It’s your go-to app for savings, loyalty points, and hassle-free shopping!
 
GET STARTED NOW
 
Download the Pick n Pay asap! & Smart Shopper app today to unlock your rewards, and start enjoying easy, fast, and affordable shopping. Whether you're stocking up on groceries, getting essentials for home, or treating yourself to something special, Pick n Pay has you covered.

Discover trendy outfits, dresses, jeans and affordable clothing with fast shipping and 1000+ new arrivals weekly. Our online shopping app brings stylish women's, curve, men's and kids’ fashion to your fingertips as the #1 most-searched fashion brand.

-----
WHY FASHION NOVA IS YOUR STYLE ESSENTIAL
-----

• 1000+ NEW ARRIVALS WEEKLY: Be the first to rock the latest trends and new clothes before anyone else. Our design team brings you trendy outfits inspired by runway looks.
• INCLUSIVE SIZING: Perfect fits for every body type with our Women's, Plus Size, Curve, Men's, and Kids collections. Our trendy clothing is designed to flatter all bodies.
• CELEBRITY-APPROVED STYLES: Worn and loved by today's biggest stars. Our trendy outfits have been featured in music videos, red carpet events, and social media posts.
• UNBEATABLE PRICES: Runway-inspired fashion at discount prices that won't break the bank. We deliver boutique-quality clothing at affordable prices.
• LIGHTNING-FAST SHIPPING: Get your must-have pieces delivered quickly to your door. Shop new clothes and have them arrive in time for the weekend.
• EASY RETURNS: Hassle-free 30-day return process to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase of our stylish clothes.

-----
APP FEATURES THAT ELEVATE YOUR ONLINE SHOPPING
-----

• PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS: Discover stylish clothes curated just for you based on your browsing history and preferences.
• EASY CHECKOUT: Save your details for one-tap purchasing, making buying trendy clothing faster than ever.
• EXCLUSIVE APP-ONLY DEALS: Access special discounts and flash sales first, before they're available anywhere else.
• WISH LIST: Save your favorites to shop later. Keep track of those must-have trendy pieces you want.
• ORDER TRACKING: Monitor your package from warehouse to doorstep with real-time updates on your trendy outfits.
• REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS: Get instant alerts on new arrivals, restocks, and exclusive flash sales.
• SECURE PAYMENT OPTIONS: Shop with confidence using multiple payment methods including installment plans.

-----
DISCOVER OUR TRENDING COLLECTIONS
-----

What you want, when you want it.

Delivery from your favorite restaurants, grocery stores, and more! Find the dish you crave or the product you can’t live without through the Sargasso Sea app. Sargasso Sea gets you what you want, when you want it. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE FOOD
Browse nearby restaurants. Choose from a variety of food delivery options to order and enjoy, including: pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, chinese food and more! Prefer Pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to Pickup your order instead. Order your food from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. Or, schedule your food order in advance for a delivery agent to pick it up later. Your choice!

GROCERY, CONVENIENCE, RETAIL AND MORE
From your local favorite grocery store, liquor shops to the big beauty brands. Just Sargasso it, and get them delivered in about an hour.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your order on a map as it heads your way. See the estimated delivery time to your address. Get notified when your order arrives.

EASY PICKUP OR CONTACT-FREE DELIVERY
You can order ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select “SELF PICK-UP”, add the items to your cart and go to the restaurant/store to get your order. Or, request contact-free delivery for a no-contact experience. If you have additional instructions or preferences, you can let your delivery agent know where you’d like your order to be placed-like a lobby, doorstep, or another dedicated place.

UPFRONT DELIVERY CHARGE
With Sargasso Sea, you can see your delivery charge up front before placing your order. That means you’ll always have an idea of what you'll pay for delivery before placing your order.

TIP AND RATE YOUR DELIVERY AGENT
You can support our delivery agents by adding a tip for them right in the app when placing your order. After every order is delivered, you can submit a rating along with comments.

ORDER FROM ANYWHERE IN BERMUDA
Available across all cities in Bermuda.


So go ahead and Get Sargasso!

Kurt Geiger is an inclusive, creative vision powered by kindness. We pride ourselves on being ‘kind by design.’ Our iconic collection of handbags, and shoes, including our signature rainbow emblem represents hope for a kinder future. We invite our customers to enjoy our creative London designs and share in the kindness through Kurt Cares Loyalty, with every purchase raising a minimum of £1 for the Kurt Geiger Kindness Foundation.  The Kindness Foundation aims to make creative roles accessible for everyone, particularly those with marginalised identities. Together, with our People Empowered ambassadors, we hope to celebrate the creative brilliance of the next generation. Shop with us for a brighter future. Kurt Geiger app to browse and shop our iconic footwear and accessories collections from the palm of your hand.  Add your favourites to your wishlist and be the first to know about new product drops and our latest offers. Plus, use our store locator to find your nearest Kurt Geiger.

FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 3 interest-free instalments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or with financing.¹

¹ UK: Klarna’s Pay in 3/Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Klarna Financing is regulated if it charges interest or lasts over 12 months. It is not regulated if it’s 0% interest and 12 months or less. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Klarna’s Regulated Financing has a representative APR of 21.9% (fixed).

¹ Ireland: Please shop responsibly. 18+ ROI residents only. Credit subject to status. APR 0%. Missed payments may incur a fee and affect your ability to use Klarna in the future. T&Cs apply. https://www.klarna.com/ie/terms-and-conditions/. 

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback. Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.²

² Klarna Cashback Rewards are awarded as points which can be redeemed for a credit to your Klarna Balance and other benefits. Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.³ 

³ UK & Ireland: A paid Klarna Membership is required for a physical card. Klarna Membership offered for a monthly fee. Cancel any time in the Klarna app. Exclusions, conditions, and limitations apply to membership benefits like Klarna Membership cashback. Klarna Membership Terms apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money to your balance and pay flexibly, anywhere you shop. Get instant refunds, earn cashback at eligible stores, and convert your cashback as a credit in your balance.⁴

⁴ Ireland: Account covered by the Swedish deposit guarantee scheme. Max. compensation per customer: SEK 1,050,000. National Debt Office makes compensation available within 7 business days from the date a right to compensation accrues. Read more here.

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support.

Shop the Etsy app.
 
App Marketplace Features
 
Global Marketplace: Buy Global, Support Local
• Shop over 15+ categories of original items from all over the world—from handmade furniture to vintage clothing.
• Favourite shops, save items, and organise your pieces in collections for future inspiration.
• Buy unique finds from trusted tastemakers, including Martha Stewart, Naomi Osaka, and more.
• Explore the latest trends and get inspired with the fall and winter trend guide, curated by our marketplace insights and experts.
 
Gift Special: Gifting with Etsy
• Create a gift list of your favourite items and save special occasions for helpful reminders.
• Shopping last minute? Make every gift special with custom gift teasers that give people a sneak peek at their present. Or, send a gift card with a personalised touch!
• Personalise style essentials, jewellery, and decor to make your gifts one-of-a-kind.
 
Save More: Offers & Deals
• Stay updated on offers and deals from small shops with push notifications.
• Buy curated selections of items on sale from Etsy sellers you love.
• Shop thrift finds and keep fashion circular, with vintage steals from small shops.
 
 
Shopping with Ease: Track, Chat & Buy
• Chat with Etsy sellers, ask questions, and stay in-the-know on your order status.
• Read customer reviews for small shops that speak to you.
• Order up and track shipments easily from the app, with customisable notifications.
• Purchase safely with secure payments, including credit/debit, Etsy gift cards, Paypal, Klarna, and quick purchases with Apple Pay.  
 
Unique Finds for All: Home, Style & More
• Furniture, home goods and decor: Style your space or give the perfect housewarming gift with pieces like handmade glassware sets or a custom dining table.
• Original art and collectibles: Explore current trends and vintage finds from around the world, like Turkish pottery and Portuguese ceramics.
• Clothes, jewellery and accessories: Shop vintage designer clothing and handmade accessories to elevate your personal wardrobe.
• DIY ideas: Get all the supplies and craft kits you need to throw a themed party or learn a new hobby.
